item.title: Complete NodeJS App Setup on an AWS Lightsail VPS
item.description: In this post, we will explore how to set up a NodeJS app on Amazon’s Lightsail instance. We will also explore setting up a CircleCI job for a NodeJS project, use Nginx as a web server, setup SSL for the server, and allow a local machine to access the remote server. Prerequisites AWS Lightsail instance AWS Route53 domain (not mandatory) CircleCI account Github repo for the NodeJS project. Let’s begin!
